name: Shadow-lore
description: You have made a study of the Enemy's many servants and can identify their weaknesses. You may spend 1 Hope to add your WITS bonus die to an attack roll targeting a creature of Shadow.

name: Durin's Way
description: You are skilled at navigating underground passages and ancient Dwarven halls. You never become lost underground, and may attempt a Riddle roll to find a secret path when none is apparent.

name: Redoubtable
description: Cultural Blessing of the Longbeards. You halve the Load rating of any armour you're wearing (rounding fractions up), including helms (but not shields).

name: Resolute
description: You have steeled yourself against harm. You may ignore 1 point of Endurance loss when you suffer a Wound.

name: Determined
description: Once per session, you may re-roll one Body die on any roll.

name: Stout-hearted
description: Once per session, you may ignore the Miserable condition for one scene, acting as if you were not Miserable.

name: Confidence
description: Your VALOUR rank is added to your starting Endurance.

name: Fair of Face
description: You have been gifted with remarkable beauty. Your Awe rolls are Favoured when used in social situations.

name: Quick of Hearing
description: Your hearing is exceptionally sharp. Your Scan rolls to detect sounds are Favoured.

name: Bold
description: You are fearless in the face of danger. You may spend Hope to make your VALOUR rolls Favoured.

name: True Friend
description: You have a bond of deep friendship with another character. Once per session you may spend a Fellowship point on their behalf even if you are not present.

name: Hobbit-sense
description: Cultural Blessing. Your WISDOM rolls are Favoured, and you gain an advantage die on all Shadow Tests made to resist the effects of Greed.

name: Stout-hearted
description: Cultural Blessing of the Bardings. Your VALOUR rolls are Favoured.

name: Elven-skill
description: Cultural Blessing. If you are not Miserable, you can spend 1 point of Hope to achieve a Magical success on a roll when using a Skill in which you possess at least one rank.

name: Bree-blood
description: Cultural Blessing. Each Man of Bree in the Company increases the Fellowship Rating by 1 point.

name: Kings of Men
description: Cultural Blessing. Add 1 point to one Attribute of your choice.

name: Swift of Foot
description: You can move with exceptional speed. Your Athletics rolls for running and chasing are Favoured.

name: Keen-eyed
description: Your vision is remarkable. Your Awareness rolls in open terrain are Favoured.

name: Night-goer
description: You can move through darkness without penalty. You may attempt Stealth rolls even in complete darkness.

name: Lord of the Hunt
description: You are a master tracker. Your Hunting rolls are Favoured when tracking prey in the wild.

name: Mithril Coat
description: A legendary protection. Once per session, you may avoid one Wound that would otherwise affect you.

name: Stone-hard
description: Your body has become as resilient as stone. Add +3 to your Endurance.

name: Ancient Wisdom
description: Your long years have given you deep insight. Your Lore rolls are Favoured.
